analyzed: yang dag yang dag ma yin nyid //üîΩces gsungs so zhes bya byas ni /
translated: the real and the unreal are described.‚Äù

original: yang dag pa nyid dang yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'i tshig gi don rnam pa gzhan du rnam par bshad pa ston to /
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid dang yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'i tshig gi don rnam pa gzhan du rnam par bshad pa ston to /
translated: This teaches the explanation of the meaning of the words ‚Äúreality‚Äù and ‚Äúunreality.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten bdag tu mngon par zhen pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten bdag tu mngon par zhen pa de'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because the world is attached to a self,

original: 'jig @88b rten gyi tha snyad la ltos pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa bdag tu smra ba bstan pa ni yang dag pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'jig @88b rten gyi tha snyad la ltos pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa bdag tu smra ba bstan pa ni yang dag pa nyid yin la /
translated: the teaching that consciousness is the self, in dependence on worldly convention, is reality.

original: bstan bcos kyi tha snyad la ltos pa'i dbang gis bdag med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin par bstan pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi tha snyad la ltos pa'i dbang gis bdag med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin par bstan pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: The teaching that consciousness is not the self, because it is selfless, in dependence on the convention of the treatise, is unreality.

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyis chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyis chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: By the method of the Mahayana, because all things are unproduced,

original: shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i spyod yul nyid du 'gyur ba dngos po'i tshul gyis yang dag pa nyid la sogs par rnam par brtags pa gang yin pa de lta bu med pas /
analyzed: shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i spyod yul nyid du 'gyur ba dngos po'i tshul gyis yang dag pa nyid la sogs par rnam par brtags pa gang yin pa de lta bu med pas /
translated: as the domain of consciousness, whether conceptual or nonconceptual,

original: yang dag min min yang dag min //
analyzed: yang dag min min yang dag min //
translated: it is not unreal, nor is it real.

original: de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o //üîΩzhes bya bas ni yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o // zhes bya bas ni yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyang ma yin la /
translated: That is the teaching of the Buddha.

original: yang dag pa nyid kyang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don rnams gzhan du rnam par bshad pa ston te /
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid kyang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don rnams gzhan du rnam par bshad pa ston te /
translated: This shows that the meaning of the words ‚Äúnot unreal, nor real‚Äù is explained elsewhere.

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul ni don dam pa ba ste /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul ni don dam pa ba ste /
translated: The way of the Mahayana is ultimate.

original: des chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul nyid du 'gyur ba dngos po'i tshul gyis yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de lta bu med pas yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: des chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul nyid du 'gyur ba dngos po'i tshul gyis yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de lta bu med pas yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Because all phenomena are non-arisen, there is no such conception that the domain of conceptual cognition and non-conceptual cognition is unreal by the power of fact.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ni dngos po rgyu dang rkyen las gdags par zad kyi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ni dngos po rgyu dang rkyen las gdags par zad kyi /
translated: The teachings of the Bhagavan Buddhas are mere imputations from causes and conditions.

original: yod pa dang med pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro // de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o //
translated: They are not existent or non-existent.

original: zhes gsungs pa la /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa la /
translated: That is the teaching of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don bye brag tu bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don bye brag tu bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the etymologies of the words ‚ÄúBuddha,‚Äù ‚Äúteaching,‚Äù and ‚Äúteaching of the Buddha,‚Äù

original: de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa'i phyir /
translated: Buddha means that which has realized the reality of phenomena without error.

original: sangs rgyas te drang srong mchog rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas te drang srong mchog rnams so //
translated: The supreme sages are the buddhas.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi'i mtho ris dang byang grol gyi bde ba 'dod pa rnams la dbang po dang bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang dus kyi dbang gis mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam phyin ci ma log par rjes su ston pas
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi'i mtho ris dang byang grol gyi bde ba 'dod pa rnams la dbang po dang bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang dus kyi dbang gis mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam phyin ci ma log par rjes su ston pas
translated: Teaching means that which teaches the unmistaken paths to the higher realms and liberation to those who desire the happiness of the higher realms of gods and humans and liberation, in accordance with their faculties, attitudes, latent tendencies, and time.

original: bstan pa'o // yang na rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i nyon mongs pa dag chags dang bcas pa'i dgra thams cad tshar gcod pas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa'o // yang na rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i nyon mongs pa dag chags dang bcas pa'i dgra thams cad tshar gcod pas bstan pa'o //
translated: Or it is the teaching because it destroys all the afflictions that exist in one's own and others' mindstreams, like enemies with attachments.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa @89a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa @89a * //
translated: The teaching of the Buddha is the teaching of the buddhas.

original: ste zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: ste zhes bya ba smras so //
translated: This is what is said.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa de'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang de la nan tan bya bar bskul ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa de'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang de la nan tan bya bar bskul ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the nature of the teaching of the buddhas and to exhort one to practice it,

original: tha snyad dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul mchog tu rmad du byung ba thogs pa med pa smra ba gzhan dag dang thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: tha snyad dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul mchog tu rmad du byung ba thogs pa med pa smra ba gzhan dag dang thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: the supreme, wondrous, unobstructed way of the conventional and ultimate truths is not shared in common with other teachers.

original: mngon par zhen pa'i zug rdu thams cad dbyung ba'i phyir de la nan tan bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa'i zug rdu thams cad dbyung ba'i phyir de la nan tan bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: In order to extract all the splinters of clinging, one should practice it.

original: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa tha snyad dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi skyon dang bral ba mu stegs byed thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa don dam pa gsal bar byed pa yin te
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa tha snyad dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi skyon dang bral ba mu stegs byed thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa don dam pa gsal bar byed pa yin te
translated: This is the teaching of the transcendent buddhas, the way of the conventional and ultimate truths, free from the faults of existence and nonexistence, not shared in common with any tƒ´rthikas, and it illuminates the ultimate.

original: / de'i phyir de kho na mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: / de'i phyir de kho na mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis /
translated: Therefore, those who wish to see thatness

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'i zug rdu thams cad dbyung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'i zug rdu thams cad dbyung ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to extract all the splinters of attachment to all mundane and supramundane things,

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gis gsungs pa dag la mngon par ma zhen par byas te de kho na gang nyid yin pa de nyid la nan tan bya'o /üîΩ// / bam po drug cu gnyis pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gis gsungs pa dag la mngon par ma zhen par byas te de kho na gang nyid yin pa de nyid la nan tan bya'o / // / bam po drug cu gnyis pa /
translated: one should not cling to the statements made by the power of mundane conventions, and one should strive in the reality that is just as it is.

original: rang gi sde dang gzhan gyi sde pa dag las phal cher skyon 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: rang gi sde dang gzhan gyi sde pa dag las phal cher skyon 'dogs par byed de /
translated: Most of our own schools and other schools impute faults,

original: gal te khyod dngos po'i ngo bo nyid gzhan gyis yongs su btags pa ma lus par bsal bas de kho na rtogs par 'dogs na /
analyzed: gal te khyod dngos po'i ngo bo nyid gzhan gyis yongs su btags pa ma lus par bsal bas de kho na rtogs par 'dogs na /
translated: saying, ‚ÄúIf you impute the understanding of reality to the complete elimination of the nature of entities imputed by others,

original: 'o na de'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya dgos so //
analyzed: 'o na de'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya dgos so //
translated: then you must explain its characteristics.‚Äù

original: ci ste mi ston na ni rang gi phyogs nges par mi 'jog la /
analyzed: ci ste mi ston na ni rang gi phyogs nges par mi 'jog la /
translated: If you do not explain it, you do not posit your own position,

original: gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin par byed pa'i phyir khyed co 'dri ba nyid yin no zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin par byed pa'i phyir khyed co 'dri ba nyid yin no zhes bya bas ni /
translated: and because you refute the position of others, you are just a debater.‚Äù

original: sngar bstan bcos mdzad pa /
analyzed: sngar bstan bcos mdzad pa /
translated: The treatise master has already taught:

original: thams cad yang dag yang dag min //üîΩyang dag yang dag ma yin nyid //
analyzed: thams cad yang dag yang dag min // yang dag yang dag ma yin nyid //
translated: All is real and not real,üîΩReal and not real,

original: yang dag min min yang dag min //
analyzed: yang dag min min yang dag min //
translated: Not unreal and not real.

original: de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o //üîΩzhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o // zhes gsungs pas /
translated: This is the teaching of the Buddha.üîΩThus the BhagavƒÅn has said:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gis ni 'di ni yang dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gis ni 'di ni yang dag pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the perspective of worldly convention, this is real.

original: 'di ni yang dag pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩ'di ni yang dag pa nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid ma yin no zhes kyang gsungs la /
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag pa nyid ma yin no // 'di ni yang dag pa nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid ma yin no zhes kyang gsungs la /
translated: This is not real.üîΩThis is both real and not real.‚Äù

original: don dam par ni yang dag pa nyid ma yin par yang mi brjod la /
analyzed: don dam par ni yang dag pa nyid ma yin par yang mi brjod la /
translated: But ultimately he does not say it is not real and he does not say it is real.

original: yang dag pa nyid du yang mi brjod pa des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi skyon dang thal ba /
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid du yang mi brjod pa des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi skyon dang thal ba /
translated: Therefore the teaching of the buddhas, the BhagavƒÅns, is free from the faults and consequences of existence and nonexistence.

original: mu stegs byed thams @89b cad dang thun mong ma yin pa /
analyzed: mu stegs byed thams @89b cad dang thun mong ma yin pa /
translated: It is not shared in common with tƒ´rthikas.

original: don dam pa gsal bar byed pa yin par gsungs pas de'i phyir de kho na mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gis gsungs pa de dag la mngon par ma zhen par byas te /
analyzed: don dam pa gsal bar byed pa yin par gsungs pas de'i phyir de kho na mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gis gsungs pa de dag la mngon par ma zhen par byas te /
translated: Therefore, those who wish to see the way things really are should not cling to those statements that are made in terms of worldly convention.

original: don dam par de kho na gang nyid yin pa de nyid la nan tan bya'o zhes bshad pa de la /
analyzed: don dam par de kho na gang nyid yin pa de nyid la nan tan bya'o zhes bshad pa de la /
translated: They should strive to understand the way things really are.

original: 'dir rang gi sde pa dang / gzhan gyi sde pa dag las phal cher skyon 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'dir rang gi sde pa dang / gzhan gyi sde pa dag las phal cher skyon 'dogs par byed de /
translated: In response to this, most of our own and other schools level the following criticism:

original: de dag na re gal te khyed dbu ma pa dngos po'i ngo bo nyid gzhan gyis yongs su btags pa ma lus par bsal bas de kho na rtogs par 'dod na /
analyzed: de dag na re gal te khyed dbu ma pa dngos po'i ngo bo nyid gzhan gyis yongs su btags pa ma lus par bsal bas de kho na rtogs par 'dod na /
translated: If you MƒÅdhyamikas, by means of completely dispelling all other natures of things, wish to realize the way things really are,

original: 'on des na de kho na'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa bstan par bya dgos so //
analyzed: 'on des na de kho na'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa bstan par bya dgos so //
translated: then you must explain what the defining characteristic of thatness is.

original: ci ste mi ston na khyed rang gi phyogs nges par mi 'jog la /
analyzed: ci ste mi ston na khyed rang gi phyogs nges par mi 'jog la /
translated: If you do not explain it, then you will not be able to ascertain your own position,

original: gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: and you will be refuting the position of others.

original: khyed kyi sgrub pa de gzhan la co 'dri ba nyid yin pas bden pa ma yin no zhes zer ba'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: khyed kyi sgrub pa de gzhan la co 'dri ba nyid yin pas bden pa ma yin no zhes zer ba'i tshig yin no //
translated: Your practice is just a pretext for others, so it is not true.

original: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis 'dir bshad pa /
translated: In response to that statement, the author of the commentary explains here:

original: gal te de kho na'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de kho na'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba zhig yin na ni /
translated: If the characteristic of reality were something to be expressed,üîΩthen it would be necessary to teach it.

original: bstan par bya dgos pa yang bden pa zhig ni de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: bstan par bya dgos pa yang bden pa zhig ni de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: But it is true that it is not to be expressed.

original: don dam pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The characteristic of ultimate reality is not to be expressed.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:üîΩMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, teach the ultimate.

original: 'jam dpal khyod kyis don dam pa ston cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal cang mi smra bar 'dug pa na de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam dpal khyod kyis don dam pa legs par bstan to zhes bka' stsal to zhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod kyis don dam pa ston cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal cang mi smra bar 'dug pa na de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam dpal khyod kyis don dam pa legs par bstan to zhes bka' stsal to zhes gsungs pas /
translated: When Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ remained silent, the TathƒÅgata said, ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, you have taught the ultimate well.‚Äù

original: 'dir yang don dam pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pas kho bos de ma bstan par khyed de la mngon par zhen pa'i phyogs dgag pa tsam byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir yang don dam pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pas kho bos de ma bstan par khyed de la mngon par zhen pa'i phyogs dgag pa tsam byas pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, since the characteristic of ultimate reality is inexpressible, I have not taught it. I have merely refuted your attachment to it.

original: kho bos khyed la co 'dri ba nyid ma yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: kho bos khyed la co 'dri ba nyid ma yin no zhes ston to //
translated: Therefore, I am not mocking you.

original: 'on kyang skye bo las dang po pa dag yang dag par dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir so sor rtog pa'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas de ltar rnam par nges pas 'di bshad par bya ste zhes bya bas ni ;
analyzed: 'on kyang skye bo las dang po pa dag yang dag par dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir so sor rtog pa'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas de ltar rnam par nges pas 'di bshad par bya ste zhes bya bas ni ;
translated: Nevertheless, in order to console those who are beginners, I will explain this by means of the conceptual thought consciousness.

original: de ltar don dam pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid de ni brjod par mi nus mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar don dam pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid de ni brjod par mi nus mod kyi /
translated: Thus, although the characteristic of ultimate reality is inexpressible,

original: 'on kyang kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du skye bo las dang po pa yang dag par dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du skye bo las dang po pa yang dag par dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir /
translated: nevertheless, in order to console beginners by means of conventional expressions,

original: so sor rtog pa'i shes pa tha snyad pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas de kho na'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de ltar rnam par nges pas don dam pa @90a * //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i shes pa tha snyad pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas de kho na'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de ltar rnam par nges pas don dam pa @90a * //
translated: The conventional discriminating cognition, which is associated with conceptual thought, ascertains the characteristics of reality as they are.

original: pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid 'di bshad par bya ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid 'di bshad par bya ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore, this characteristic of ultimate reality should be explained.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, he says:üîΩNot known from another, peaceful,

original: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang // spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
analyzed: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang // spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
translated: not fabricated by mental fabrications,

original: rnam rtog med don tha dad min //
analyzed: rnam rtog med don tha dad min //
translated: without conceptual differentiation, not different,

original: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
translated: that is the characteristic of reality.

original: zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: He says this.

original: des ni re zhig don dam pa pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
analyzed: des ni re zhig don dam pa pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
translated: By this, he has demonstrated the characteristic of ultimate reality.

original: de dag nyid bye brag tu bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir //üîΩde la gzhan las shes min zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag nyid bye brag tu bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir // de la gzhan las shes min zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate just those distinctions, he says:üîΩRegarding that, not known from another.

original: 'di la gzhan las shes pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la gzhan las shes pa med pa ste /
translated: It is not known from another.

original: lung med par bdag gi mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bdag nyid kyis rang rig par bya ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: lung med par bdag gi mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bdag nyid kyis rang rig par bya ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: it is not to be known by itself,üîΩit is peace, it is not elaborated.

original: don dam pa 'di la gang zag gzhan las shes pa med pa ste /
analyzed: don dam pa 'di la gang zag gzhan las shes pa med pa ste /
translated: It is not known from another means that it is not known from another person.

original: gzhan gyi lung med par bdag gi mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bdag nyid kyis rang rig par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lung med par bdag gi mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bdag nyid kyis rang rig par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not to be known by itself means that it is not to be known by itself, by direct perception.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir te /
translated: Peace means that it is free from intrinsic reality,üîΩbecause it is not the domain of conceptual thought that has the intrinsic reality and particulars of things as its object.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo nyid dang khyad par gyi yul la rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa'i phyir dngos po'i ngo bo nyid dang khyad par gyi yul la rnam par rtog pa ma zhi ba'i spyodüîΩyul ma yin pa zhi ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo nyid dang khyad par gyi yul la rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa'i phyir dngos po'i ngo bo nyid dang khyad par gyi yul la rnam par rtog pa ma zhi ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa zhi ba yin no //
translated: It is not the domain of the non-peaceful conceptual thought that has the intrinsic reality and particulars of things as its object, because it is empty of intrinsic reality.

original: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
analyzed: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
translated: It is not elaborated by elaborations.

original: zhes bya ba ni mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi spros pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi spros pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is because the proliferation of the characteristics of verbal expression is completely pacified.

original: 'jig rten pa'i spros pa gang la mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa'i spros pa de nye bar zhi ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i spros pa gang la mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa'i spros pa de nye bar zhi ba'i phyir te /
translated: This is because the proliferation that has the characteristic of verbal expression in worldly proliferation is completely pacified.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúfree from worldly dharmas.‚ÄùüîΩNonconceptuality is because of the absence of the appearance of objects, since it is not conceptually differentiated as this or that.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni snang pa med pa nyid kyis 'di dang 'di'o zhes rnam par ma brtags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gang la yul snang ba dang bral ba de ni snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni snang pa med pa nyid kyis 'di dang 'di'o zhes rnam par ma brtags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gang la yul snang ba dang bral ba de ni snang ba med pa'o //
translated: That which is free from the appearance of objects is without appearance.

original: de'i dngos po ni snang ba med pa nyid de /üîΩdes 'di ni kha dog go //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni snang ba med pa nyid de / des 'di ni kha dog go //
translated: The state of that is the absence of appearance.

original: 'di ni dbyibs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bur rnam par ma brtags pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dbyibs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bur rnam par ma brtags pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of that, it is nonconceptuality, since it is not conceptually differentiated as ‚Äúthis is color,‚Äù ‚Äúthis is shape,‚Äù and so on.

original: don tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni chos nyid ro gcig pa'i phyir don dbyer med pa de zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: don tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni chos nyid ro gcig pa'i phyir don dbyer med pa de zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Non-difference of object refers to the fact that the object is undifferentiated because of the single taste of reality.

original: chos nyid kyi ro stong pa nyid ces bya bar gcig pa'i phyir dmigs su med pas don dbyer med pa'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi ro stong pa nyid ces bya bar gcig pa'i phyir dmigs su med pas don dbyer med pa'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The object is undifferentiated because of the non-apprehension of the single taste of emptiness, which is reality.

original: de ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni don snga ma lnga po dag gi mjug bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: de ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni don snga ma lnga po dag gi mjug bsdu ba ste /
translated: This is the characteristic of reality refers to the conclusion of the five former topics.

original: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do @90b zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do @90b zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: This is the characteristic of reality should be supplied.

original: da ni tshig gi don lnga po de dag gi mtshams sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir de la gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa de'i phyir spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: da ni tshig gi don lnga po de dag gi mtshams sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir de la gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa de'i phyir spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the connection of those five topics, he says: because it is non-conceptual, therefore it is not elaborated by mental fabrication.

original: 'di ltar rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang ba las mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi spros pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang ba las mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi spros pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For thus, mental fabrication arises from the characteristic of verbal expression, which is itself generated by conceptualization.

original: gang gi phyir spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa de'i phyir zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa de'i phyir zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is not fabricated by fabrications, therefore it is peace.

original: 'di ltar spros pa dag mi 'jug pa nyid zhi ba zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar spros pa dag mi 'jug pa nyid zhi ba zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, it is said that since fabrications do not engage it, it is peace.üîΩBecause it is peace, therefore it is the domain of nonconceptual intuition.

original: gang gi phyir zhi ba de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar ma zhi pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa don tha dad pa'i yul can skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhi ba de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar ma zhi pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa don tha dad pa'i yul can skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, it is said that since a nonpeaceful state is the domain of a conceptual consciousness, it is the domain of a consciousness that has a different object.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul yin pa de'i phyir gzhan las shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul yin pa de'i phyir gzhan las shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is the domain of nonconceptual intuition, therefore it is not known from another.

original: 'di ltar gzhan las shes pa la rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan las shes pa la rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, it is said that because conceptualization arises in the knowledge that is known from another,

original: gang gzhan las shes pa ma yin pa de la tshig mi 'jug pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gzhan las shes pa ma yin pa de la tshig mi 'jug pas de'i phyir /
translated: that which is not known from another is not engaged by words. Therefore,

original: de kho na'i ngo bo nyid ni tshig gis sgro gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar tshig tu brjod par bya ba yin na gzhan las shes pa nyid du 'gyur bas de'i phyir /
analyzed: de kho na'i ngo bo nyid ni tshig gis sgro gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar tshig tu brjod par bya ba yin na gzhan las shes pa nyid du 'gyur bas de'i phyir /
translated: The reality of thatness is utterly beyond verbal reification.üîΩSince it is thus expressed in words, it would be known from another.

original: de kho na'i ngo bo nyid ni tshig gi sgro gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin pas de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na'i ngo bo nyid ni tshig gi sgro gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin pas de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reality of thatness is utterly beyond verbal reification, and so it is inexpressible.

original: de ni brjod par mi nus mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: de ni brjod par mi nus mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: Although it cannot be expressed, etc.

original: de ltar de kho na'i mtshan nyid de ni brjod par mi nus mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar de kho na'i mtshan nyid de ni brjod par mi nus mod kyi /
translated: Although the reality of thatness cannot be expressed in such a way,

original: 'on kyang kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang khyad par dgag pa ston pa'i bshad pa yi ge la brten te 'byung bas don dam pa pa'i de kho na thabs kyi sgo nas bstan to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang khyad par dgag pa ston pa'i bshad pa yi ge la brten te 'byung bas don dam pa pa'i de kho na thabs kyi sgo nas bstan to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: nevertheless, in terms of conventional expressions, it is taught by means of explanations that depend on words, which negate the reality and distinctions of all things. Thus, the ultimate thatness is taught by means of skillful methods.

original: da nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this, he says,

original: dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang khyad par dgag pa ston pa'i bshad pa de kho na'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par nus pa /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang khyad par dgag pa ston pa'i bshad pa de kho na'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par nus pa /
translated: The explanation that teaches the negation of the reality and the distinctions of all things is capable of realizing the reality of just that.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa /
translated: It is in accord with the arising of the nonconceptual consciousness that arises in the manner of non-arising.

original: yi ger sgro btags pa las 'byung bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba smras te //
analyzed: yi ger sgro btags pa las 'byung bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba smras te //
translated: It will occur from the superimposition of syllables.

original: de la dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / khyad par dgag pa ston pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi gzhi yin la /
analyzed: de la dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / khyad par dgag pa ston pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi gzhi yin la /
translated: Regarding this, the explanation that teaches the negation of the reality and the distinctions of all things is the basis of distinction.

original: de kho @91a * //
analyzed: de kho @91a * //
translated: The reality of just that

original: na'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par nus pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba dag ni bshad pa de'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: na'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par nus pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba dag ni bshad pa de'i khyad par yin no //
translated: and the nonconceptual consciousness that is capable of realizing it, which is in accord with the arising that arises in the manner of non-arising, are the distinctions of that explanation.

original: de lta bu'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i bshad pa de sgo gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i bshad pa de sgo gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one asks through which door will that explanation, which has such distinctions, occur?

original: yi ger sgro btags pa pa las 'byung bar 'gyur te kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du de lta bu'i bshad pa yi ge la brten te 'byung bas don dam pa pa'i de kho na thabs kyis bstan to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yi ger sgro btags pa pa las 'byung bar 'gyur te kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du de lta bu'i bshad pa yi ge la brten te 'byung bas don dam pa pa'i de kho na thabs kyis bstan to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It arises from the superimposition of letters, and such an explanation arises in dependence on letters as conventional designations. Thus, the method teaches the suchness of the ultimate.

original: de ltar de kho na rang rig par bya ba thabs kyi sgo nas bstan pas mtshan nyid ma bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir co 'dri ba nyid ma yin pas skyon gdags su med do zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma'i lan gyi mjug bsdu ba yin no
analyzed: de ltar de kho na rang rig par bya ba thabs kyi sgo nas bstan pas mtshan nyid ma bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir co 'dri ba nyid ma yin pas skyon gdags su med do zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma'i lan gyi mjug bsdu ba yin no
translated: Since suchness is taught by the method of being reflexively known, it is not the case that its characteristics are not taught. Therefore, since it is not a mere joke, it cannot be faulted. This is the conclusion of the response to the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: // de ltar re zhig don dam pa pa'i de kho na bstan to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: // de ltar re zhig don dam pa pa'i de kho na bstan to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, the suchness of the ultimate is taught.üîΩIt is not known from others, is peace,

original: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang // spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
analyzed: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang // spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
translated: and is not elaborated by elaborations.

original: rnam rtog med don tha dad min //
analyzed: rnam rtog med don tha dad min //
translated: It is nonconceptual and not a different object.

original: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
translated: That is the characteristic of suchness.

original: zhes bya ba de ni re zhig don dam pa pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de ni re zhig don dam pa pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is the definition of the ultimate reality.

original: da ni kun rdzob pa bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: da ni kun rdzob pa bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: Now, the conventional reality is to be explained.

original: kun rdzob pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid ston to //
analyzed: kun rdzob pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid ston to //
translated: This is the definition of the conventional reality.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, he says:

original: gang la brten te gang 'byung ba //
analyzed: gang la brten te gang 'byung ba //
translated: That which arises in dependence on something

original: de ni re zhig de nyid min //
analyzed: de ni re zhig de nyid min //
translated: is not that,

original: rgyu gang la brten te 'bras bu gang byung ba de ni re zhig de nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu gang la brten te 'bras bu gang byung ba de ni re zhig de nyid ma yin te /
translated: That which arises as an effect in dependence on a cause is not that cause.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: This is the meaning: the effect is not identical with the cause.

original: dper nas bon la brten te myu gu 'byung ba ni sa bon gang kho na yin pa de myu gu kho na ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper nas bon la brten te myu gu 'byung ba ni sa bon gang kho na yin pa de myu gu kho na ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the sprout which arises in dependence on the seed is not that seed.

original: de nyid kyi tshad ma bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshad ma bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the validity of this, he says:

original: rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa de nyid ma yin no zhes shes par byar nus te /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa de nyid ma yin no zhes shes par byar nus te /
translated: It is possible to understand that the effect is not different from the cause, but it is not the same.

original: blo tha dad pas shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: blo tha dad pas shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are objects of knowledge of different minds.

original: dper na rtogs pa dang rtogs par bya ba bzhin no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dper na rtogs pa dang rtogs par bya ba bzhin no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: For example, it is like the understood and the understanding.

original: de dag ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de dag ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: The subject, the probandum, the probative property, and the example are to be applied in order.

original: dper na rtogs pa dang rtogs par bya ba ni blo tha dad pa shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na rtogs pa dang rtogs par bya ba ni blo tha dad pa shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, the understood and the understanding are objects of knowledge of different minds.

original: de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du rgyud dang 'bras bu yang blo tha dad pas shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de gnyis kyang @91b gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du rgyud dang 'bras bu yang blo tha dad pas shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de gnyis kyang @91b gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Because of that, those two are not the same. Likewise, the continuum and the effect are objects of knowledge of different minds. Because of that, those two are not the same.

original: de nyid kyi 'thad pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi 'thad pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate another reason for that,

original: yang na rgyu gang la brten te 'bras bu gang byung ba de ni re zhig de nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na rgyu gang la brten te 'bras bu gang byung ba de ni re zhig de nyid ma yin te /
translated: first, the effect that arises in dependence on a cause is not the same as that cause.

original: rgyu'i bdag nyid las mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: rgyu'i bdag nyid las mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Because it would follow that it would not arise from the nature of the cause.

original: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gcig pa nyid yin par gyur na rgyu'i bdag nyid las rgyu nyid mi skye ba de bzhin du rgyu'i bdag nyid las 'bras bu yang mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gcig pa nyid yin par gyur na rgyu'i bdag nyid las rgyu nyid mi skye ba de bzhin du rgyu'i bdag nyid las 'bras bu yang mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni mi 'dod do //
translated: If the two, cause and effect, were the same, then just as the cause itself does not arise from the cause, it would follow that the effect also would not arise from the nature of the cause.

original: da ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gzhan nyid kyang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gzhan nyid kyang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that the two, cause and effect, are not different,

original: de las gzhan pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúBecause it is not different from that . . .‚Äù

original: dper na sa bon las gzhan pa myu gu'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na sa bon las gzhan pa myu gu'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, because the nature of the sprout is not different from the seed,

original: sa bon las myu gu gzhan pa'ang ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sa bon las myu gu gzhan pa'ang ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: the sprout is not different from the seed.

original: de nyid kyi 'thad pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi 'thad pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate another proof of that,

original: gang las brten te gang 'byung ba //
analyzed: gang las brten te gang 'byung ba //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúWhatever arises in dependence on something . . .‚Äù

original: de ni de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin te //
analyzed: de ni de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin te //
translated: is not different from that.

original: zhes shes par byar nus te /
analyzed: zhes shes par byar nus te /
translated: This can be understood.

original: rgyu ma yin pa las mi skye ba bzhin du rgyu las kyang 'bras bu mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /üîΩgal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gzhan nyid yin par gyur na ji ltar 'bras kyi rgyu ma yin pa nas las 'bras mi skye ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa las mi skye ba bzhin du rgyu las kyang 'bras bu mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te / gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gzhan nyid yin par gyur na ji ltar 'bras kyi rgyu ma yin pa nas las 'bras mi skye ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as it does not arise from a noncause, so too it would follow that an effect would not arise from a cause.üîΩIf the cause and effect were different, then just as an effect does not arise from a noncause, such as barley,

original: 'bras kyi rgyun 'bras kyi sa bon nyid las kyang 'bras kyi myu gu mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yang de mi 'dod do //
analyzed: 'bras kyi rgyun 'bras kyi sa bon nyid las kyang 'bras kyi myu gu mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yang de mi 'dod do //
translated: so too it would follow that an effect would not arise from a cause, such as a barley seed.

original: de nyid kyi tshad ma bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshad ma bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To demonstrate that this is a valid reason,

original: yang na rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan pa'ang ma yin te zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan pa'ang ma yin te zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
translated: it should be understood that an effect is not different from its cause.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na brten te 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na brten te 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: If cause and effect were related, then the effect would arise in dependence on the cause, like the nature of the cause itself.

original: de dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: They are respectively the subject, the predicate of the probandum, the reason, and the example.

original: dper na rgyu'i rang gi bdag nyid ni rang gi rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na brten te byung ba'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid las rang nyid gzhan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na rgyu'i rang gi bdag nyid ni rang gi rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na brten te byung ba'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid las rang nyid gzhan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: For example, the nature of a cause is not different from itself when it is related to its effect, because it arises in dependence on itself.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis kyang 'brel na brten te byung ba'i phyir rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis kyang 'brel na brten te byung ba'i phyir rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the two, cause and effect, are not different from each other when they are related, because they arise in dependence on each other.

original: gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba khyad par dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir /üîΩde las gzhan pa la brten te byung ba'i 'bras bu @92a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba khyad par dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir / de las gzhan pa la brten te byung ba'i 'bras bu @92a * //
translated: The application of the reason is qualified.

original: dag gis ma nges pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: dag gis ma nges pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bya bas ni /
translated: Therefore, it is not indeterminate with respect to effects that arise in dependence on something other than that.

original: rjes su dpag pa snga ma'i gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba la rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na zhes bya ba dang brten te byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba tshig gnyis smos pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa snga ma'i gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba la rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na zhes bya ba dang brten te byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba tshig gnyis smos pa ni /
translated: In the syllogism of the former inference, the two phrases ‚Äúif there is a relationship of cause and effect‚Äù and ‚Äúbecause it arises in dependence‚Äù are stated.

original: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na zhes bya ba'i khyad par ma smos par brten te 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba de tsam zhig smos par gyur na pha rol po dag 'di skad ces 'di na brten te byung yang gzhan yin pa nas kyi sa bon
analyzed: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na zhes bya ba'i khyad par ma smos par brten te 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba de tsam zhig smos par gyur na pha rol po dag 'di skad ces 'di na brten te byung yang gzhan yin pa nas kyi sa bon
translated: If the phrase ‚Äúif there is a relationship of cause and effect‚Äù were not stated and only the phrase ‚Äúbecause it arises in dependence‚Äù were stated, then the opponent might say, ‚ÄúIn this case, although something arises in dependence, it is different, as in the case of barley seeds and rice sprouts, which are seen to be different.

original: dang 'bras kyi myu gu lta bu dag snang bas des na ci re zhig brten te byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dang 'bras kyi myu gu lta bu dag snang bas des na ci re zhig brten te byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, what is the point of saying ‚Äòbecause it arises in dependence‚Äô?

original: dper na nas kyi sa bon las 'bras kyi myu gu gzhan nyid yin par de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na nas kyi sa bon las 'bras kyi myu gu gzhan nyid yin par de bzhin du /
translated: For example, just as a rice sprout is different from a barley seed,

original: rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur ram /
translated: in the same way, an effect would be different from its cause.‚Äù

original: 'on te brten te byung ba'i phyir dper na nas kyi sa bon las nas kyi myu gu gzhan nyid ma yin pa bzhin du rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan nyid ma yin par 'gyur ba ma nges par dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs de ma grub po zhes zer bar
analyzed: 'on te brten te byung ba'i phyir dper na nas kyi sa bon las nas kyi myu gu gzhan nyid ma yin pa bzhin du rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan nyid ma yin par 'gyur ba ma nges par dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs de ma grub po zhes zer bar
translated: Thus, the Madhyamaka reason is not established.

original: 'gyur bas ma nges pa nyid kyi skyon de bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gyur bas ma nges pa nyid kyi skyon de bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to dispel that fault of uncertainty,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na brten te byung ba'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba khyad par dang bcas pa byas te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel na brten te byung ba'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba khyad par dang bcas pa byas te /
translated: the application of the reason ‚Äúbecause they are related‚Äù is made with a distinction.

original: de'i phyir nas kyi sa bon de las gzhan pa 'bras kyi sa bon la brten te byung ba'i 'bras kyi myu gu dang nas kyi sa bon dag brten te byung yang rgyu dang 'bras bur ma 'brel bas gzhan yin pa lta bu dag gi ma nges pa nyid
analyzed: de'i phyir nas kyi sa bon de las gzhan pa 'bras kyi sa bon la brten te byung ba'i 'bras kyi myu gu dang nas kyi sa bon dag brten te byung yang rgyu dang 'bras bur ma 'brel bas gzhan yin pa lta bu dag gi ma nges pa nyid
translated: Therefore, the barley sprout is not uncertain because it is related to the barley seed, but the rice sprout is uncertain because it is not related to the barley seed.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the fault of uncertainty does not apply.

original: nas kyi sa bon dang nas kyi myu gu dang rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel pa yang yin la /
analyzed: nas kyi sa bon dang nas kyi myu gu dang rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel pa yang yin la /
translated: The seed of barley and the sprout of barley are related as cause and effect, and they are also dependent origination.

original: brten te 'byung ba yang yin pa'i phyir de gnyis gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa 'dir gtan tshigs su byed pas de ma nges pa nyid ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: brten te 'byung ba yang yin pa'i phyir de gnyis gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa 'dir gtan tshigs su byed pas de ma nges pa nyid ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: Since these two are not different, it is not the case that the reason is not established.üîΩThe word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù means the meaning of the reason.

original: phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gtan tshigs kyi don te zhes bya ba ni tshig le'ur byas pa'i rtsa ba 'das ma thag pas /
analyzed: phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gtan tshigs kyi don te zhes bya ba ni tshig le'ur byas pa'i rtsa ba 'das ma thag pas /
translated: The immediately preceding root text says:

original: de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir //
translated: Because it is not different from that.

original: zhes bya ba de'i mjug nas phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra smos pa ni 'og nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de'i mjug nas phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra smos pa ni 'og nas /
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù at the end of that is stated because of the following:

original: de phyir chad min rtag ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir chad min rtag ma yin //
translated: Therefore, it is not annihilated and not eternal.

original: zhes 'byung ba de sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don yin par sbyar ro //üîΩde nyid bstan pa'i phyir gang gi phyir de ltar rgyu las 'bras bu de nyid kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba de sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don yin par sbyar ro // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gang gi phyir de ltar rgyu las 'bras bu de nyid kyang ma yin la /
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is applied to the meaning of the reason that proves that.

original: gzhan pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, the root text says, ‚ÄúBecause the effect is not the same as the cause and it is not different from the cause.‚Äù

original: de phyir chad min rtag ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir chad min rtag ma yin //
translated: Therefore, it is not annihilated, nor is it eternal.

original: zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smras so //
translated: Thus it is said.üîΩIn order to teach that very point in detail,

original: de nyid bye brag tu bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bye brag tu bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: it is said:üîΩBecause the seed is destroyed, and because the effect arises in a continuous series, it definitely endures.

original: 'di la gang gi phyir chu zhig kyang 'bras bu skye bas rgyun gyis @92b nges par gnas shing rgyun zhig kyang 'bras bu de mi 'jig pa'i gzhan nyid ma yin pas chad pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di la gang gi phyir chu zhig kyang 'bras bu skye bas rgyun gyis @92b nges par gnas shing rgyun zhig kyang 'bras bu de mi 'jig pa'i gzhan nyid ma yin pas chad pa ma yin la /
translated: Because the series is destroyed, and because the effect does not perish when the cause is destroyed, it is not annihilated.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i dus na rgyu 'jig cing rgyu de zhig kyang 'bras bu nam yang mi 'jig pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i dus na rgyu 'jig cing rgyu de zhig kyang 'bras bu nam yang mi 'jig pas de'i phyir /
translated: Because the cause is destroyed when the effect arises, and because the effect is never destroyed when the cause is destroyed,üîΩit is not eternal.

original: de nyid ma yin pas rtag pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de nyid ma yin pas rtag pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: de ltar gang gi phyir gang la brten te gang byung ba de nyid kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: de ltar gang gi phyir gang la brten te gang byung ba de nyid kyang ma yin la /
translated: Because that which arises in dependence on something is not that,

original: de de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin pa de'i phyir chad pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: de de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin pa de'i phyir chad pa yang ma yin la /
translated: and because it is not something other than that, therefore it is not annihilated,

original: rtag pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa yang ma yin no //
translated: and because it is not that, it is not eternal.

original: 'di ltar sa bon nyid myu gu yin par gyur na sa bon rtag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar sa bon nyid myu gu yin par gyur na sa bon rtag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, if the seed itself were the sprout, the seed would be eternal.

original: gang gi phyir sa bon nyid myu gu ma yin pa de'i phyir sa bon rtag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sa bon nyid myu gu ma yin pa de'i phyir sa bon rtag pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the seed itself is not the sprout, therefore the seed is not permanent.

original: gal te sa bon yang gzhan nyid la myu gu yang gzhan yin par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te sa bon yang gzhan nyid la myu gu yang gzhan yin par gyur na /
translated: If the seed were one thing and the sprout were another,

original: de lta na sa bon rnam pa thams cad du rgyun chad pas chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na sa bon rnam pa thams cad du rgyun chad pas chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the seed would be completely severed, and that would be annihilation.

original: gang gi phyir sa bon las myu gu gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir sa bon chad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sa bon las myu gu gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir sa bon chad pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the sprout is not another thing from the seed, therefore the seed is not annihilated.

original: de nyid kyi khungs slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi khungs slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, the source is stated, composed by the master ƒÄryadeva:

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gang phyir dngos po 'jug 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang phyir dngos po 'jug 'gyur ba //
translated: Because things proceed from things,

original: des na chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore there is no annihilation.

original: gang phyir dngos po ldog 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang phyir dngos po ldog 'gyur ba //
translated: Because things cease from things,

original: des na rtag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rtag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore there is no permanence.

original: zhes bshad pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba smras so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: yang na kha cig na re chos nyid rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir chad pa ma yin la /
analyzed: yang na kha cig na re chos nyid rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir chad pa ma yin la /
translated: Or, some say: Because reality is followed, there is no annihilation.

original: chos rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no zhes zer ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no zhes zer ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because phenomena are stopped, it is not eternal.

original: 'grel pa byed pa nyid na re 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i chos nyid rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir chad pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'grel pa byed pa nyid na re 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i chos nyid rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir chad pa ma yin la /
translated: The author of the commentary says: Because the reality called ‚Äúeffect‚Äù is engaged, it is not annihilated.üîΩBecause the phenomenon called ‚Äúcause‚Äù is stopped, it is not eternal.

original: rgyu zhes bya ba'i chos rnam par ldog pa'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no zhes zer ba'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: rgyu zhes bya ba'i chos rnam par ldog pa'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no zhes zer ba'i tshig yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ltar de kho na'i mtshan nyid don dam pa pa dang / kun rdzob pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de kho na'i mtshan nyid don dam pa pa dang / kun rdzob pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the characteristics of reality, which is ultimate and conventional,

original: da ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid bstan pa de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bdud rtsi yin pas de nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid bstan pa de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bdud rtsi yin pas de nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach that the teaching of the Bhagavat Buddha, which is the nectar of the doctrine, should be accomplished with effort,üîΩtherefore,

original: de'i phyir de ltar /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar /
translated: it is said:

original: don gcig min don tha dad min //
analyzed: don gcig min don tha dad min //
translated: It is not one thing, not different things,

original: chad pa ma yin rtag min pa //üîΩde ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi //
analyzed: chad pa ma yin rtag min pa // de ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi //
translated: not annihilated, not eternal,üîΩthat is the nectar of the doctrine

original: mgon po'i bstan pa bdud rtsi yin //üîΩzhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: mgon po'i bstan pa bdud rtsi yin //üîΩzhes bya ba smras te /
translated: of the Lord Buddha, the protector of the world.

original: de ltar mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam rnam par 'byed pa /
analyzed: de ltar mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam rnam par 'byed pa /
translated: Thus, it is the one who distinguishes the paths to the higher realms and liberation.

original: don gcig pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: don gcig pa ma yin pa /
translated: It is not a single meaning.

original: chad pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: chad pa ma yin pa /
translated: It is not nihilism.

original: rtag pa ma yin pa /üîΩgcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / chad pa dang @93a * //
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin pa / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / chad pa dang @93a * //
translated: It is not eternalism.

original: rtag pa'i skyon las phyi rol du gyur pa /
analyzed: rtag pa'i skyon las phyi rol du gyur pa /
translated: It is beyond the faults of being the same, different, nihilistic, and eternalistic.

original: mchog tu zab pa /üîΩdon dam pa'i de kho na gsal bar byed pa de ni 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa /
analyzed: mchog tu zab pa / don dam pa'i de kho na gsal bar byed pa de ni 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa /
translated: It is supremely profound.

original: thams cad gzigs pa /
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pa /
translated: It illuminates the ultimate reality. It is the nectar-like teaching of all the BhagavƒÅn Buddhas, the Omniscient, the All-Seeing,

original: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with the power of the ten powers,

original: 'jig rten gyi mgon po rgyu med par sems can la byams pa rnams kyi bstan pa bdud rtsi yin te bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi mgon po rgyu med par sems can la byams pa rnams kyi bstan pa bdud rtsi yin te bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: the protectors of the world, who have causeless love for sentient beings, in order to attain mundane and supramundane bliss. It should be accomplished.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that,

original: bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi'i go 'phang thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi'i go 'phang thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: it is called nectar because it is the cause for attaining the state of nectar.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis de rtogs nas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis de rtogs nas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: The bodhisattvas, who possess the immeasurable accumulations of merit and wisdom, realize that and strive to benefit all migrating beings.

original: rab tu brtson par byed pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma dag tu gyur nas gsung gi 'od zer dag gis sems can skal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi blo gros kyi pad ma dag kha 'byed par mdzad pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyis kyang thos pa dang bsams pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu brtson par byed pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma dag tu gyur nas gsung gi 'od zer dag gis sems can skal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi blo gros kyi pad ma dag kha 'byed par mdzad pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyis kyang thos pa dang bsams pa dang /
translated: Having become the sun of perfect complete buddhahood, they open the lotuses of the minds of fortunate sentient beings with the light rays of their speech.

original: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa yongs su 'dris par byas pas tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni bdud rtsi yin no zhes bya ba smras te ;
analyzed: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa yongs su 'dris par byas pas tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni bdud rtsi yin no zhes bya ba smras te ;
translated: The sravakas, through becoming familiar with the knowledge that arises from listening, reflection and meditation, directly perceive nirvana in this very life and thus completely pacify all suffering.üîΩThis is nectar.
